data.title: Google removes misleading ads in voting-related searches
data.text: Alphabet Inc's Google said on Monday that it had removed search ads that charged users searching for voting information large fees for voter registration or harvested their personal data.

data.title: Now Isn’t the Time to Buy Alphabet Stock
data.text:
As an investment in today’s market, GOOG stock is tech giant that has a lot going for it from a bearish perspective.
The post Now Isn’t the Time to Buy Alphabet Stock appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: How Google's Loss Is Others' Gain
data.text: Why Google losing ad revenue is an opportunity for others -- and what it means for Google going forward.

data.title: It’s Not Just Facebook: Companies Are Pausing All Social Media Advertising
data.text: Businesses assess spending money on social media platforms where alleged hate speech proliferates.

data.title: Google makes it free for sellers to list items in search results
data.text: The update escalates the search giant's rivalry with Amazon.

data.title: DOJ, AG Barr moves to complete Google anti-trust investigation
data.text: Fox News Senior Judicial Analyst Judge Andrew Napolitano discusses why big tech is not violating antitrust laws by freeing political speech as the Department of Justice gets ready to complete an investigation.

data.title: Alphabet's Waymo and Volvo Collaborate on Driverless Cars
data.text: Alphabet's (GOOGL) self-driving project, Waymo recently announces a partnership with Volvo to expand its autonomous drive ride-hailing program.

data.title: Take $2,000 and Protect Your Portfolio With These 3 Stocks
data.text: For those who don't want the risk of investing 100% of their money in high-flying stocks, these companies fit the bill.

data.title: Waymo And Volvo Form Exclusive Self-Driving Partnership
data.text: Waymo and Volvo announced an “exclusive” partnership to integrate Waymo’s self-driving technology onto Volvo’s vehicular platform.
